comments:
On a dstore-linux connection, I have a directory with following subdirectories:
   N20060727-1801
   N20060807-0100
   N20060809-0100
Moreover, in the same directory I have a symbolic link:
   latest -> N20060809-0100

Each of the directories contains an installation of RSE Server (not running!).
I now select all three directories at the same time and choose rightclick > delete. Following NullPointerException is printed to stdout, and an error dialog "NullPointerExcpetion" is shown: I suppose that the problem might be due to the symbolic link "latest" which I have not been using though.
When I select the directories individually, I can delete them without exception.

I didn't get the null pointer when doing the batch delete but I did find that the delete failed due to some missing logic on the server side.  I've made changes that allow the delete to occur properly now.
